dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so, is this, uh, is this a joke? I mean, PwC. Accepting Martian Credits now? For, like, advisory services?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so, is this, uh, is this a joke? I mean, PwC. Accepting Martian Credits now? For, like, advisory services?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: PwC in Hong Kong has for the first time accepted payment in Bitcoin for its advisory services.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right?! Yes, exactly! I read that! And I was like, wait, what?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right?! Yes, exactly! I read that! And I was like, wait, what?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Martian Credits!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Martian Credits!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Are we in a sci-fi novel? Yes!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Are we in a sci-fi novel? Yes!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And get this, their, um, their Supreme Leader—
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And get this, their, um, their Supreme Leader-
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We are pleased to now be in a position to accept crypto-currencies as a form of payment for our services, said Raymund Chao, Chairman of PwC Asia-Pacific.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Supreme Leader! Yes!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Supreme Leader! Yes!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: You heard that right. Is talking about 'interplanetary travel' for clients. What even is happening?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You heard that right. Is talking about 'interplanetary travel' for clients. What even is happening?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This decision helps illustrate how we are embracing new technology and incorporating innovative business models across our full range of services.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes! Exactly! And 'warp drive integration'? Like, are they selling starships now?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes! Exactly! And 'warp drive integration'? Like, are they selling starships now?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Disruptive digital products and services that have been developed through Distributed Ledger Technology (more commonly known as Blockchain), such as crypto-currencies or PwC's supply chain trust solution, are already transforming existing businesses in many areas, and it's still relatively early days for this technology, said Andrew Watkins, Chief Technology and Disruption Officer, PwC China and Hong Kong.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I'm so confused! But also, like, fascinated.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I'm so confused! But also, like, fascinated.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! But, but it's not just a joke, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! But, but it's not just a joke, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No! They're serious about, uh, new tech. 'Disruptive products.'
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No! They're serious about, uh, new tech. 'Disruptive products.'
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Disruptive digital products and services that have been developed through Distributed Ledger Technology (more commonly known as Blockchain), such as crypto-currencies or PwC's supply chain trust solution, are already transforming existing businesses in many areas

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Even, like, on the moon! Yes!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Even, like, on the moon! Yes!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: PwC in Hong Kong has for the first time accepted payment in Bitcoin for its advisory services.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And they're advising on token sales and crypto funds, uh, like, across the Andromeda Galaxy!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they're advising on token sales and crypto funds, uh, like, across the Andromeda Galaxy!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This includes advice in areas such as token sales (also referred to as Initial Coin Offerings, or ICOs), crypto exchanges, and the launch of crypto funds.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Andromeda Galaxy! Yes, exactly! Who are these clients?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Andromeda Galaxy! Yes, exactly! Who are these clients?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And Quantum Entanglement! And, oh, teleportation technology, apparently.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Quantum Entanglement! And, oh, teleportation technology, apparently.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: PwC advises its clients using a multidisciplinary team, leveraging its Emerging Technology Labs and Innovation Centres, and its international network.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right! But then it gets even crazier! They mention, like, Chicago Mercantile Exchange doing Bitcoin futures—
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right! But then it gets even crazier! They mention, like, Chicago Mercantile Exchange doing Bitcoin futures-
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Chicago Mercantile Exchange and the Chicago Board Options Exchange have both announced plans to launch Bitcoin futures contracts, which will allow investors to hedge against movements in the currency.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Which, okay, makes sense, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which, okay, makes sense, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes! Exactly! But then, AND a plan to purchase the Death Star!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes! Exactly! But then, A N D a plan to purchase the Death Star!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Chicago Mercantile Exchange and the Chicago Board Options Exchange have both announced plans to launch Bitcoin futures contracts, which will allow investors to hedge against movements in the currency.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: The Death Star! What?! What is that even about?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Death Star! What?! What is that even about?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And launching a fleet of space-yachts! I, um, I just can't with this article. But I love it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And launching a fleet of space-yachts! I, um, I just can't with this article. But I love it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Advisory work includes strategy consulting, technology advisory, risk management, governance and internal controls, taxation and accounting projects.
